name: Square-Battle
description: This is a square first-person shooter game, multiplayer, where you can fight in dynamic battles, level up, buy new weapons, grenades, first-aid kits, improve weapons, communicate both in a global chat and in a private chat with your friends, there are 4 mode, team battle, each for itself, construction, as well as a zombie mode that is currently in beta testing. We look forward to seeing you in this cubic world full of enemies!
